commit.message:
s390.c (legitimize_pic_address): Use s390_load_address to load addresses.

	* config/s390/s390.c (legitimize_pic_address): Use s390_load_address
	to load addresses.

From-SVN: r91302

files.patch:

+	to load addresses.
+
 2004-11-25  Mark Mitchell  <mark@codesourcery.com>
